main.description: Assign a report to the current user.

reportId.description: The ID of the report to assign.

queueId.description: Optional queue ID to associate the assignment with. If not provided and the report has been assigned on a queue before, it will stay on that queue.

assign.description: Whether to assign or un-assign the report to the user.

errors.name: AlreadyAssigned
errors.description: The report is already assigned to another user.
